    Format the given key with paramaters

    Author:
    Valentin Burgaud (Xharos), <xharos@islandswars.fr> Created the 09/12/2017 at 15:37
    See Also:
    String.format(String, Object...)

      java.lang.String format​(Locale locale, java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object... parameters)
      Get a String according to the given language and format with the given parameters
      java.lang.String format​(java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object... parameters)

    • Method Detail

      • format

        java.lang.String format​(java.lang.String key,
                        java.lang.Object... parameters)
        Get a String according to the default language (French) and format with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        key - the property key
        parameters - the properties label to format with
        Returns:
        a String.format(String, Object...), or else the key
        See Also:
        format(Locale, String, Object...)

      • format

        java.lang.String format​(Locale locale,
                        java.lang.String key,
                        java.lang.Object... parameters)
        Get a String according to the given language and format with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        locale - a language to use
        key - the property key
        parameters - the properties label to format with
        Returns:
        a String.format(String, Object...), or else the key
